text: fakhalafa min baʿdihim khalfun warithu l-kitaba yakhudhuna ʿarada hadha l-adna wayaquluna sayugh'faru lana wa-in yatihim ʿaradun mith'luhu yakhudhuhu alam yu'khadh ʿalayhim mithaqu l-kitabi an la yaqulu ʿala l-lahi illa l-haqa wadarasu ma fihi wal-daru l-akhiratu khayrun lilladhina yattaquna afala taʿqiluna
